snippet: Target joins two other big advertisers in what Nickelodeon called multimillion-dollar deals to be incorporated in NickMom programming.
abstract: Target joins two other big advertisers in what Nickelodeon called multimillion-dollar deals to be incorporated in NickMom programming.
lead_paragraph: A third major marketer has agreed to become a charter sponsor of new programming from Viacom on television and online, which is aimed at mothers who watched the company's Nickelodeon cable channel when they themselves were children.

headline.main: Nickelodeon Adds a Sponsor for Programming for Mothers
